The list that I run is pretty much based on Antique Chinese and Japanese
ceramics, but I think we do have members who have a substantial
knowledge of modern Asian Studio ceramics. 
 
If anyone is interested :
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/chinese_ceramics/
 
- Matt
